"2020-09-01 16:47:18", reservation_no: "0", review_no: "4", score: "5", status: "ALIVE", updated: "2020-09-01 16:47:18" } ]) //페이지 개수 const [per, setPer] = useState(5) const [arr, setArr] = useState([]) // 실제 페이지네이션을 쪼개서 뿌려주는 리스트 const [list, setList] = useState([]) const [page, setPage] = useState({ start: 0, end: 5, current: 1 }) const pageBlock = Math.ceil(testData.length / per) const array = [] for (let i = 0; i < pageBlock; i++) { array.push(i + 1) } useEffect(() => { const start = (page.current - 1) * 5 const end = start + 5 const list = testData.slice(start, end + 1) setList(list) setArr(array.slice(page.start, page.end)) }, [page.current]) const onPageUp = () => { if (page.current < arr[arr.length - 1]) { setPage({ ...page, current: page.current + 1 }) } else if (page.current % page.end === 0 && page.end < pageBlock) { setPage({ start: page.start + 1, end: page.end + 1, current: page.current + 1 }) setArr(array.slice(page.start + 1, page.end + 1)) } } const blockCount = () => {} const onPageDown = () => {} return ( <>
